body_html: I think the easiest way to make the Travis build pass is if we revert #2214 and investigate why Trusty gcc is flaking like this out-of-band. We've seen this error intermittently when developing on trusty in the jit branch and haven't nailed down why.
body_text: I think the easiest way to make the Travis build pass is if we revert #2214 and investigate why Trusty gcc is flaking like this out-of-band. We've seen this error intermittently when developing on trusty in the jit branch and haven't nailed down why.
body: I think the easiest way to make the Travis build pass is if we revert https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2214 and investigate why Trusty gcc is flaking like this out-of-band. We've seen this error intermittently when developing on trusty in the jit branch and haven't nailed down why.
